decrease 4 single_crochet color a decrease 4 decrease x 3= 30 place eyes between rounds 8 and 9 leaving 7 holes between them with the face towards you place the left eye above the 6th increase count 7 holes over and place the 2nd eye do not place the backs of the eyes yet 15 color a 3 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet color b single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet color a decrease 3 single_crochet decrease x 3= 24 16 color a 6 single_crochet color b 5 single_crochet color a 13 single_crochet now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and insert the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you sweet oddity art 3 head and body continued reach the look you want follow the pictures on pg 5 for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then restuff it continue with color a 17 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 18 4 single_crochet increase x 6= 36 19 single_crochet in each st around stuff the body as you work 20 increase 11 single_crochet x 3= 39 21 single_crochet in each st around 22 increase 12 single_crochet x 3= 42 23 single_crochet in each st around 24 6 single_crochet increase x 6= 48 25 7
